cast.name: 格列佛·麦格拉思 Gulliver McGrath
Niko El Santo Zavero Niko El Santo Zavero

awards:
第73届威尼斯电影节(2016)
　　地平线单元奖 最佳影片(提名) Nicholas Verso
　　酷儿狮奖(提名) Nicholas Verso
introduction: Halloween 1997 – the last night of high school for Corey, Jango and their skater gang, The Gromits. Childhood is over and adult life beckons. But for Corey, his past has some unfinished business. When he encounters Jonah, a former childhood friend but now victimised by Jango’s cruel streak, Corey takes pity on him and agrees to walk him home for old time’s sake. What starts off as a normal walk through empty suburban streets descends into something darker and magical, as trip through their memories and ghosts of the past, and Corey is surprised to discover how much he still has in common with his abandoned friend. And even the most buried truths will find a way of coming to life. Best unproduced screenplay award at the 2011 New York Gay and Lesbian Film Festival.
